#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <climits>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <map>
#include <vector>


#define pp push_back

int MOD  = 1000000000 + 7;

using namespace std;

int main()
{



	long long int test;
	cin>>test;


	while(test--)
	{
		long long int tempcase;
		cin>>tempcase;
		long long int ind = sqrt(tempcase);

		while ((ind *(ind+1)/2) <= tempcase) ind+=1;

		long long int lower = (ind-1)*ind/2 + 1;

		long long int diff = tempcase - lower;

//		cout<<ind<<" "<<diff<<endl;
		long long int x = 0,y = 0;

		if (ind%2)
		{
			x = ind-diff;
			y = 1+diff;
		}
		else
		{
			x = 1+diff;
			y = ind-diff;
		}

		cout<<"("<<x<<","<<y<<")\n";

	}


	return 0;
}
